data.title: Jobs at Simpson Dental
data.meta_description: Jobs at Simpson Dental on Dentist Job Connect
data.text:
The practice was founded in 1948. Dr. Mark Simpson and Dr. Christen Simpson Raynes provide high-quality, comprehensive dentistry in Charleston, West Virginia, including dental implant supported teeth. Our dental office features an on-site dental lab to provide patients with implant-supported dentures in as little as one day and much more!

Our comprehensive dental care includes services such as ZOOM whitening, crowns, veneers, bridges, oral surgery, Invisalign, and facial aesthetics.

We also utilize top-of-the-line technology. Equipped with CEREC, Prime Scan, MCXL puck milling machine, X-Guide 3D Navigation, Laser Welder, Deca Co2 laser and Nd/Yag laser, Microscope, piezo surgical units, Carestream 9600 CT scanner, etc.

We are a fee for service practice that prides itself on our customer service. Our mission is to provide the community with the highest quality of dental care by using the finest materials and state of the art technology in the most caring way.

Full time Part time

$200,000 - $350,000 yearly

Simpson Dental Charleston, west VA, USA

Our facility has an in-house lab that has three lab technicians and is equipped with CEREC, Prime Scan, MCXL puck milling machine, X-Guide 3D Navigation, Laser Welder, Co2 lasers, etc. The goal is to find an associate that wants to eventually be a partner. Dr. Mark is retiring and he can stay on as a mentor if needed. Daily Guarantee for 90 days $1,000 per day, or a % of collections, whichever is higher when observed over that time frame. Earning potential over $500K Buy in/earn in opportunity Potential for buy in if doctor displays leadership qualities. Associate should think like an owner and act like a partner. Contributes to resolve team conflicts and cares about the overall success of the practice. Fast paced practice with a great team culture and highly trained. We have 4 assistants, 2 hygienists, 2 front desk, 3 lab technicians, 1 bookkeeper, 1 office manager along with the two doctors. FFS practice Charleston Area Activities and...
